definition: accord/to make contact/to agree/to consult with/extensive
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: The Company always welcome friends from all walks of life come to guide negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 本公司随时欢迎各界朋友亲临指导洽谈。

sentences.english: Workshop director of high-strength comrades wholeheartedly welcome customers to negotiate business.
sentences.chinese: 车间主任高强同志竭诚欢迎广大客户前来洽谈业务。

sentences.english: Are welcome to waste materials business unit and individual calls business negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎有废旧物资的企业单位及个人来电洽谈业务。

sentences.english: Mr. Black is talking with the Chinese importer about inspecting the goods。
sentences.chinese: 布莱克先生与中方进口商就商品检验问题进行洽谈。

sentences.english: Welcome to talk about the cooperation with us.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎新老客户来电来函洽谈合作事宜。

sentences.english: You may however wish to include a small buffer to allow for some negotiating room.
sentences.chinese: 可是你想包括一个小缓冲允许一些洽谈室。

sentences.english: We sincerely welcome the traders to come here and talk business…
sentences.chinese: 竭诚欢迎广大国内外客户来人来函洽谈业务。

sentences.english: We warmly welcome every loom makers and users to our company for contracting.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎各主机厂和织机用户来厂洽谈业务。

sentences.english: Our Business department engages in diversified Business. Inquiries are welcome.
sentences.chinese: 本经营部从事多种经营，欢迎客商洽谈。

sentences.english: Welcome the customers from home and abroad to negotiate and develop together.
sentences.chinese: 我公司期待国内外客户前来洽谈，共图发展。

sentences.english: Not long afterward, we took a trade mission to Japan together.
sentences.chinese: 之后不久，我们一起去日本洽谈贸易。

sentences.english: Assist products department manager with the suppliers' connection and new products introduction.
sentences.chinese: 协助商品课课长做好供应商和新品的引进洽谈工作。

sentences.english: Warmly welcome customers at home and abroad calls letter consulting, business negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 热情欢迎国内外的客户来函来电咨询，洽谈业务。

sentences.english: Welcomes the user to plant talks, concrete matters if stopped.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎广大用户来厂洽谈，具体事宜敬请垂询。
欢迎诚信客商来人来电洽谈。

sentences.english: Contact us to disc uss the possibilities for cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 请与我们联系洽谈合作意向。

definition: to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
to consult/to discuss seriously/to negotiate/to confer/negotiations/consultations
to cooperate/to collaborate/to work together/cooperation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to come to a decision/to fix on (a date etc)/to determine/to finalize/to nail down (a deal etc)
to arrange an interview/an appointment (with the foreign ambassador)
